modName: Dovah Cave and Tower - Player Home
summary:
The Dovah Cave is a lair used by Dovahkiins from every age. The Dovah Cave is themed as
a nordic ruin built under the nordic tower named Dovah Tower, (Formerly Bleak Falls Tower)
it comes fully equipped with a blacksmithing workshop, crafting room/study, main chamber,
sleeping area, throne/war room and an exterior tower.
descriptionHtml:
[u][b][color=red]Please Note: if you are updating from V1.6 or below, please remove all items from the mannequins inside Dovah Cave or elso you will lose them. You have been warned.[/color][/b][/u]

[color=yellow]The Dovah Cave is a lair used by Dovahkiins from every age. The Dovah Cave is themed as
a nordic ruin built under the nordic tower named Dovah Tower, (Formerly Bleak Falls Tower)
it comes fully equipped with a blacksmithing workshop, crafting room/study, main chamber,
sleeping area, throne/war room and an exterior tower. The trapdoor is locked but the key is located in a bucket somewhere 
in the tower. All storage inside the cave and tower should be safe.[/color]

[u][b][color=red]Please leave a comment and tell me what you think.

Don\'t forget to Endorse this mod if you like it![/color][/b][/u]

[color=yellow]Features:
- Lots of storage
- Bed (Tent)
- Cooking Pot
- Alchemy Station
- Enchanting Station
- Tanning Rack
- Blacksmiths Forge
- Workbench
- Grinding Wheel
- Smelter
- 5 Weapon Racks
- Tower
- Nordic Ruin
- Wood Chopping Block
- 7 Mannequins
- Throne/War Room
- Sleeping area
- 1 Weapon Plaque
- 1 Dagger Display Case

Change log:

V1.0 - Initial Release
V1.5 - Moved Bed to new sleeping area, added Throne/War room,
          Added Mannequins and more weapon racks,
          Moved some storage from main chamber to new sleeping area
V1.6 - Minor Fixes and Improvements
V1.7 - Navmesh tweaks, replaced all mannequins, added 1 mannequin and replaced bed.

Install
Extract Dovah_Cave_02.esp into Skyrim\'s Data folder.

Uninstall
Remove Dovah_Cave_02.esp into Skyrim\'s Data folder.

Credit
Bethesda
[/color]
[color=red]Permissions
Please do not upload the Dovah Cave without my permission, and do not forget to credit me
as the original author.[/color]
author: Gamatria

files.name: Dovah Cave and Tower V1_7
files.changelogHtml:
Navmesh tweaks
Replaced all mannequins
Added 1 mannequin
Replaced bed
